downloadTitle: Update for Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2013 (KB2989279)
detailsSection: This article describes an issue that could cause data loss in Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2013 RTM. An update is available to resolve this issue. The update can only be applied to Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2013 RTM. Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2013 Update 2 installations should be upgraded to Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2013 Update 4 to resolve the issue.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Small Business Server 2011

For detailed System Requirements see System Requirements for Team Foundation Server.

Team Foundation Server 2013 RTM running on a supported version of Windows.
installInstructionSection:
1. On this page, click Download to start the download.
  2. To save the download on your computer so that you can install it later, click Save.
  3. Open the self-extracting update (TFS2013-KB2989279.exe) and follow the steps in the wizard.
  4. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
